analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MNYNote.swapForToken (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol#460-463):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(MNY).transfer(msg.sender,notes.div(rate)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol)
	- transfer(feeAddress,fee) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol)
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol)

MNYNote.swapForNote (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol#437-446) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(this).mint(msg.sender,_amt.mul(rate)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol#445-446)

MNYNote.swapForToken (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol#460-463) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(MNY).transfer(msg.sender,notes.div(rate)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol)
MNYNote.MNY should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xcc9444b760c516eaa0a27548e709a8fc2f7e367a.sol#433)
